mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_ID, PASSWORD, MEMBER_NAME, EMAIL, EMAIL_AGREE, MEMBER_AGE, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_MBTI, MEMBER_CONSTELLATION, MEMBER_STATUS) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{password}, #{memberName}, #{email}, #{emailAgree}, #{memberAge}, #{memberGender}, #{memberMBTI}, #{memberConstellation}, 'active')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NAME = #{memberName} AND EMAIL = #{email}
